extendedInfo.description: Enjoy with my fantastic interactive live wallpaper, when your finger touch you create a water's ripple effectYou can choose 3 different backgrounds.How Use:    Home -----> Menu -----> Wallpapers -----> Live WallpapersSome info regards ads into this appWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep the app 100% free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. This will help keep this app 100% free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app. (Drag & Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from:Leadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutTags: water sea ocean blue abyss galleon ship ripple effect

reviews.title: Our heart and soul begins here.
reviews.comment: My life shall never be complete and go on without commanding captain. The words of a swan as she flies guarding air waves amongst every note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good...
reviews.comment: It is a good wallpaper but a little boring
reviews.author: A Google User
